wikipedia_page.main: Roddy Manley (born 23 July 1965) is a Scottish former footballer. He mainly played in defence for Falkirk, St Mirren, Instant-Dict and Dundee.

response: , McQueen was co-owner of a haulage firm in Glasgow with former Falkirk player Roddy Manley.
